title: Chinese Eastern Railway
summary: The Chinese Eastern Railway or CER (Chinese: 中國東省鐵路; pinyin: Zhōngguó Dōngshěng tiělù, Russian: Китайско-Восточная железная дорога, or КВЖД, Kitaysko-Vostochnaya Zheleznaya Doroga or KVZhD), is the historical name for a railway system in Northeast China (also known as Manchuria).
